## Ways You Can Contribute

- Create [a bug report](https://github.com/FrancesCoronel/template-repo/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&template=bug_report.md&title=Bug%3A+) to help us improve this website ðŸ›
- Request [a feature](https://github.com/FrancesCoronel/template-repo/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&template=feature_request.md&title=Feature+Request%3A+) for this project ðŸ’¡

Or just [create a regular issue](https://github.com/FrancesCoronel/template-repo/issues/new/choose) - any little bit of help counts! ðŸ˜Š

## Local Development

> Install dependencies

`npm install`

> Start local environment

`npm start`
